name: Pumpkin Dog Xtreme
description:
Pumpkin Dog Xtreme is a 3D platformer inspired by 3D platforming games from the 90’s.
Unique Retro soundtrack, over 24 levels and a boss battles and bonus stages.
The game has a large amount of different levels and large number of enemies.
Play as 2 characters, Pineapple Dog and Pumpkin Dog.
Pineapple Dog has a fisheye lens.

Game Features:
-Controller Support
-Genre, 3D Platformer
-Boss Battles
-Low poly 3D environment
-over 24 stages
-Bosses
-Special Stages
-Fisheye Lens
